DOCNAME: CASE OF DUDNICHENKO AND WAES v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 5 - Right to liberty and security (Article 5-4 - Speediness of review)
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The list of applicants and the relevant details of the applications are set out in the appended table .

CARDINAL . The applicants complained under LAW excessive length of their pre - trial detention . They further complained under LAW . In particular , in application no . ORG the applicant argued that a court had examined appeals against the detention orders in his and his counsel ’s absence , and in application no . MONEY the applicant submitted that his appeal against a detention order had not been examined “ speedily ” .
